name: Don't Go
description:
This is a short psychological horror game under the Brackeys game jam theme “Let There Be Chaos!” This is a submission for the game jam that was made in around 5-6 days. (about an hour every day)

You are trapped in an empty hallway. Each time you reach the end, it loops you back to the beginning. Sounds easy, right. But every time you reach the end, the following loop will be more and more chaotic.

This is a more linear game and it's only mechanic is moving forward and enduring the horror.  ;)

I hope you have fun playing this and the rest of the jams games!
